title: Ahead.Nero.8.v8.3.6.0.incl.Keygen.and.Activator
description:
Download this version from another site and repacked it with the all nero 8 product activator. Here&#039;s the info. 

-

Nero 8.3.6.0

Nero provides you with over 20 applications in one solution to complete all your digital media tasks on your PC and on your TV.
Nero brings the digital world to your PC. Now it&#039;s easy to organize and manage all your multimedia files, as well as create and edit new digital content. Nero&#039;s sleek design and user-friendly tools make completing projects fun and enjoyable.

Features

- Direct access to all features from the project launcher
- High Definition format support
- Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 streaming features
- Blu-ray Disc and HD DVD burning support
- SecurDisc data protection support
- Copy a disc with just one click
- Graphics optimized for Windows Vista
- Continual free updates

Applications of the Nero

Nero Mobile
Nero Mobile is an impressive media suite that provides a central repository for various media files, thereby turning smartphones and personal digital assistants (PDAs) into a powerful mobile media center.

Nero Home
Nero Home combines TV and the recording of TV channels with the playback of DVDVideos and audio/video files in one easy-to-use interface.

Nero Burning ROM
The powerful burning software Nero Burning ROM allows you to burn your data, music titles, and videos to disc.

Nero Scout
Nero Scout is a database program that creates a database from all media files on your computer so that it is indexed, cataloged, and made available for other Nero Suite programs.

Nero Search
Nero Search is a search wizard that allows you to search for files on your computer quickly and easily.

Nero StartSmart
Nero StartSmart is the user-friendly command center of the Nero Suite.

Nero Express
Nero Express provides all the performance and efficiency of Nero Burning ROM with a simplified user interface.

Nero Vision
Nero Vision is a program for recording, editing, and burning films and slide shows with an extremely user-friendly interface.

Nero Recode
Nero Recode allows you to copy non-copy-protected DVD-Videos to DVD and in this way archive them.

Nero WaveEditor
Nero WaveEditor allows you to record pieces of music, edit the corresponding audio files, for example using various filters and sound optimization methods, and finally burn them using Nero Burning ROM or Nero Express.

Nero SoundTrax
Nero SoundTrax is the professional application for the production of audio CDs. Instead of simply compiling audio files into a playlist for a CD as before, you can now mix or change the contents of the audio files.

Nero CoverDesigner
Nero CoverDesigner allows you to design covers, booklets, and labels.

Nero ShowTime
Nero ShowTime allows you to play all digital recordings (e.g. movies, TV programs, home videos, DVD-Video) with excellent picture and sound quality.

Nero PhotoSnap
Nero PhotoSnap allows you to edit photos and improve their quality using various optimization options.

Nero PhotoSnap Viewer
Nero PhotoSnap Viewer allows you to display image and photo files and search for them in image directories.

Nero MediaHome
Nero MediaHome allows you to stream TV, videos, music, and pictures on UPnP (Universal Plug and Play) capable devices and also on Nero ShowTime 2.

InCD
InCD, the packet writing application, allows you to format CDs/DVDs so that they can be used as diskettes.

Nero BackItUp
Nero BackItUp allows you to back up and restore data easy and conveniently, thereby providing a cost-effective means of archiving to CD/DVD, external hard drives, FTP servers,
or a LAN.

Nero Tools
Nero Tools contain Nero Product Setup, Nero BurnRights, Nero ImageDrive, Nero Disc-Speed, Nero DriveSpeed, and Nero InfoTool.

Nero Sipps
Nero Sipps allows you to add the functions of a high-feature Internet telephone to your computer.

Change Log
  *On some systems Nero StartSmart crashed when analyzing or erasing a disc.
  *Nero Burning ROM could not encode AC-3 audio files into another output format.
  *Under certain system configurations Nero Vision crashed when exporting a video file to camera.
  *Nero Recode could not create image files correctly with the default settings.
